system.description:
This spell functions like charm person or charm monster, but affects up to 30 total levels or Hit Dice of creatures.

Charm Effects:

  • Creatures of 31+ levels or HD are immune.
  • Each victim may attempt a saving throw vs. spells (-2 penalty) to resist the charm.
  • Charm duration is based on Intelligence (as per charm person).

Breaking the Charm:

  • If the caster attacks a charmed creature, only that creature's charm is broken.
  • Other charmed creatures witnessing the attack may attempt a new saving throw.
  • Otherwise, other charms remain unaffected.
system.effect: Charms up to 30 levels/HD of creatures
